alert.note: Alert for Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 07 at 10:09AM EST until January 08 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, bringing snow totals of 5 to 9 inches in the most-persistent snow. * WHERE...Lake county. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snow totals are expected south of I-90. Experimental content below...do not use operationally. To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4162 8091 4173 8092 4171 8116 4161 8134 4153 8169 4145 8152 4143 8152 4140 8118 4144 8108 4154 8104 TIME Y22M01D07T1200Z-Y22M01D08T0600Z
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
